Class CardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class CardController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is a display of a single card. This deals with what occurs when a card is hovered over, or rotated.
    Author:
    Christian Sanger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
      Gets all the resources necessary for the Card.
      void offHover()
      Removes the drop shadow from a card.
      void onHover()
      Adds a drop shadow to a card when the mouse hovers over it.
      void onRotateRight()
      Rotates the image on the card 90 degrees clockwise.
